about_the_game:
Hello, I'm Roy, and my girlfriend... she's a centaur.

Not too long ago, I was a CEO of a major company, completely oblivious to the existence of centaurs. Then, one fine day, my life turned upside down...

Our encounter opens up an entirely new world for me – a world where the most unusual relationships and adventures are possible.

Centaur: Myth or Reality?


Centaur. Magical beings, half human, half horse. Sounds like pure fantasy, doesn't it? But what if I told you that centaurs exist in our world? Yes, you heard me right. These mysterious creatures, of which we've only heard in legends and myths, can actually be real.

Imagine this: you're walking down an ordinary street on an ordinary day when suddenly you see something unusual – a creature whose upper half looks like a human and lower half like a horse. Incredible, isn't it? That's exactly what I thought when I first saw Eliza.

Eliza is a centaur girl. It was hard to conceal my initial reaction. After all, who of us expected to encounter a real centaur in a world where it was believed they existed only in folklore and mythology? But as I got to know her better, my attitude towards this unusual creature began to change.

And what if I told you that I fell in love with Eliza? Yes, I, an ordinary human, fell in love with a centaur girl. It raises a multitude of questions and reflections. How can we be together? How will this affect our future? But when you love someone, when the feelings are real, everything else fades into the background.

Would I accept her proposal to become her companion, her partner in this amazing journey? My reaction would probably be the same as yours. But when you immerse yourself in a world where myth becomes reality, where the impossible becomes possible, you start to see things differently.

Centaurs can be not only objects of our curiosity and wonder but also a source of inspiration, a symbol that even in a world where everything seems impossible, love and union between different beings are still possible.

Description


In this captivating visual novel, you'll dive into a story of love, adventure, and self-discovery. The game offers a unique plot filled with incredible twists and unexpected discoveries. Feel the thrill of something new, immerse yourself in a world where the impossible becomes reality, and where even the most unusual relationships can be genuine.

Features
  • HD Renders
    Experience the game in stunning high-definition quality. Each scene is meticulously crafted with detailed graphics and vibrant colors, bringing the fantasy world and its characters to life with incredible realism.
  • Intriguing Story
    Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative that keeps you on the edge of your seat.
  • Explicit Scenes
    Dive into explicit, mature content that adds depth and intensity to the storyline. These scenes are carefully integrated into the narrative, enhancing the emotional and physical connections between characters.
  • Relaxing Soundtrack
    Let the soothing and atmospheric soundtrack enhance your gaming experience. The carefully composed music sets the mood, whether you are exploring, engaging in intense scenes, or reflecting on the unfolding story.
  • Beauty of Centaur Island
    Explore the breathtaking landscapes of Centaur Island. The island’s beauty provides a stark contrast to the harsh realities of survival, offering moments of peace and wonder.
  • Unusual Sexual Encounters
    Engage in unique and unconventional sexual encounters that push the boundaries of traditional storytelling. These interactions are not just about physicality but also about exploring the complex dynamics and relationships between different beings in this extraordinary world.
  • Can Be Played with One Hand
    Enjoy the convenience of single-handed gameplay, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the experience without any distractions. This feature ensures that you can navigate through the game comfortably and effortlessly.

content_descriptors.notes: Warning: 'My Girlfriend is... Centaur' contains adult content. It features sexual characters, erotic scenes, nudity, and sexual acts, including depictions of centaur genitalia and sexual encounters with centaurs. Recommended for players aged 18 and above.
